meanings.definition: To make Greek in character or style.
meanings.sent1: She grecianizes her pottery by painting traditional Greek patterns on them.
meanings.sent2: The architect grecianizes the building by adding columns and marble statues.
meanings.sent3: The chef grecianizes the salad by using feta cheese and olives.
meanings.sent4: His music grecianizes the traditional folk songs, giving them a Greek twist.
meanings.sent5: The artist grecianizes the landscape, capturing the essence of Greek scenery.

meanings.definition: To give a Greek influence or appearance to something.
meanings.sent1: The interior designer grecianizes the room with blue and white decor.
meanings.sent2: The costume designer grecianizes the outfits with laurel wreaths and sandals.
meanings.sent3: The party planner grecianizes the event with Greek music and Mediterranean cuisine.
meanings.sent4: The painter grecianizes the mural, depicting scenes from Greek mythology.
meanings.sent5: The filmmaker grecianizes the movie, setting it in ancient Greece.
